Abstract:
The ASTER Level 1 Precision Terrain Corrected Registered At-Sensor Radiance (AST_L1T) data contains calibrated at-sensor radiance, which corresponds with the ASTER Level 1B (AST_L1B), that has been geometrically corrected, and rotated to a north-up UTM projection.  

ASTER SWIR data acquired from April 2008 to the present exhibit anomalous saturation of values and anomalous striping. This effect is also present for some prior acquisition periods. Please refer to the ASTER SWIR User Advisory Document (https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/sites/default/files/public/aster/docs/ASTER_SWIR_User_Advisory_July%2018_08.pdf) for more details.

The precision terrain correction incorporates ground control points with a digital elevation model to achieve topographic accuracy for all daytime scenes where correlation statistics reach a minimum threshold, with alternate levels of correction possible (systematic terrain, systematic, or precision) for scenes acquired at night or that otherwise represent a reduced quality ground image (e.g. cloud cover).

Each precision terrain corrected image has an independent quality assessment of the geometric correction available for distribution. both as a text file and a single band browse image with the valid GCPs overlaid.
 
This multi-file product also includes a visible/shortwave (VNIR/SWIR) infrared pseudo true color composite and/or a thermal infrared (TIR) pseudo true color composite full resolution image depending on the bands acquired in the Level-1A. No special data analysis software is required to use these GeoTIFF images. 

Differences between the ASTER Level-1T and the corresponding Level-1B and Orthorectified data products:
•	ASTER Level-1B at-sensor radiance is in a path-oriented projection as opposed to the north-up UTM projection available in both the ASTER Level-1T and ASTER Orthorectified products.
•	ASTER Level-1B images dimensions for each of the three sensor subsystems (VNIR, SWIR, and TIR) remain constant from one scene to the next, but the ASTER Level-1T and ASTER Orthorectifed image dimensions vary by scene because of the rotation process.
•	ASTER Orthorectified at-sensor radiance is produced using proprietary software and corrected using an ASTER derived digital elevation model and ground control points, whereas the ASTER Level-1T uses the GLS2000 digital elevation data, which is a bare ground DEM, and derived ground control points with Land Processes (LP) Distributed Active Archive Center (DAAC) modified Landsat geometric algorithms.  
•	The ASTER Level-1T is a multi-file product generated with a single resampling from the ASTER Level-1A input scene to provide low-resolution browse, full resolution imagery, and an independent geometric verification report with browse in addition to standard metadata.

RelatedUrls.Description: The LP DAAC Data Set Landing Page provides specific information for each of the ASTER Land Products distributed from LP DAAC.
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available products and the ability to download them via FTP.

The USGS Global Visualization Viewer (GloVis) is an online search and order tool driven by browse images.  Users may select any geographical area of interest (for any given product) and view all available browse images for that area before deciding to order those products.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
The ASTER home page is maintained through NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory and documents various aspects of the ASTER mission.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERMapProjection
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The map projection of the granule

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FlyingDirection
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The satellite flight direction when observation was performed

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GenerationDateandTime
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Date and Time granule produced

AdditionalAttributes.Name: LowerLeftQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the lower left quadrant

AdditionalAttributes.Name: LowerRightQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the lower right quadrant

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Resampling
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Method used in the calculation of new DN (digital number) for pixels created during geometric correction of a digital scene, based on the values in the local area around the uncorrected pixels.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SceneCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percentage of cloud coverage for the whole scene

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Solar_Azimuth_Angle
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Angle of the sun clockwise from true North

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Solar_Elevation_Angle
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Angle of the sun above the horizon

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SWIR_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicates whether the SWIR sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TIR_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicates whether the TIR sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttributes.Name: UpperLeftQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the upper left quadrant

AdditionalAttributes.Name: UpperRightQuadCloudCoverage
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the upper right quadrant

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VNIR1_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicates whether the VNIR1 sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VNIR2_ObservationMode
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicates whether the VNIR2 sensor group is ON or OFF

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band1_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 1 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band2_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 2 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band3B_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 3B - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band3N_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 3N - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 4 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band5_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 5 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band6_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 6 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band7_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 7 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band8_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 8 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band9_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 9 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band10_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 10 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band11_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 11 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band12_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 12 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band13_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 13 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: Band14_Available
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the status of Band 14 - [Yes, band is acquired] or [No, band was not acquired]

AdditionalAttributes.Name: RadiometricDBVersion
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The version number of the Radiometric Database used in Level 1 processing.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GeometricDBVersion
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The version number of the Geometric Database used in Level 1 processing.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERGains
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Identifies the Gain setting for the Bands: HGH, NOR, LO1, LO2, LOW, OFF

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERProcessingCenter
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Name of the center where these ASTER data were processed

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERVNIRPointingAngle
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Visible Near Infrared (VNIR) sensor

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERSWIRPointingAngle
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Shortwave Infrared (SWIR) sensor

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERTIRPointingAngle
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Thermal Infrared (TIR) sensor

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERMapOrientationAngle
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Denotes the angle between the path oriented image and the map oriented image for this ASTER scene.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: ASTERReceivingCenter
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Name of the center where these ASTER data were received

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FullResolutionVisibleBrowseAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: This attribute tells whether a full resolution visible image browse was created for the L1T granule, the answer being either 'YES' or 'NO'.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: FullResolutionThermalBrowseAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: This attribute tells whether a full resolution thermal image browse was created for the L1T granule, the answer being either 'YES' or 'NO'.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CorrectionAchieved
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The identifier to inform the user of the level of correction achieved for the product. (The choices are: Terrain+Precision, Terrain+Systematic, Systematic, Precision)

AdditionalAttributes.Name: NumberGCPChipsCorrelated
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number of ground control points (GCPs) that correlated in the Precision correction.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SpheroidCode
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Specifies the Earth-model spheroid used for the projection.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: UTMZoneNumber
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The value used to indicate the scene's zone number in UTM coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QABrowseAvailable
AdditionalAttributes.Description: This attribute tells whether a quality verification of the geometric accuracy of the L1T granule was performed and thus a QA Browse image was created, the answer being either 'YES' or 'NO'.

EntryTitle: ASTER Level 1 precision terrain corrected registered at-sensor radiance V003
